verbs.description: [ARG0: A source] [V: tells] [ARG2: CNBC] [ARG1: that Scaramucci met Goldstone a few times , and that the entertainment publicist who helped arrange the infamous Trump Tower meeting with Russians was " helpful " to the Trump campaign] .
